title: Why pick Trynd when fiora, yasuo and yi exist?
body: what does he do better in practice that one of those do not?

replies.body: Split push. He's  very, very difficult to stop him from taking towers because of his ult.

He b8's people with his ult 
Might aswell go yi though, push towers and run away

Ult is a better defensive tool than Yi has
Autos are better than Fiora or Yasuo.
oh dear god i hope people never try out sated rageblade bruiser tryndamere. i will blow my brains out if i ever see it.
Some guy tried it against my nasus. I just built visage abd frozeb heart and ignored him

|> When you go top lane
|> As tryndamere
|> Start Cull and some pots
|> Ignore enemy laner
|> Farm is more important
|> Mindlessly push out top lane
|> Enemy laner leaves lane to deal with mid affairs
|> He's sick of your shit
|> Keep pushing out top lane
|> 200 farm by 20 minutes
|> At inhib by 20 minutes
|> Enemy team comes to stop you
|> Fuck it, keep pushing anyways

The life of a Tryndamere main.

Oh man, how do you pick Tryndamere and then load into the game as Nasus? That's some next-level shit.
When theres a meme, theres a way

Get Yasuo and prepare to be rekt.

Trynda doesn't need a target for mobility and it's a far better split pusher, his ultimate is on-demand and he got a nice steroid.

split pushes like hell.

but yes, he really desparately needs a rework.
Amazing split pusher. He can punish your team when you try and 4v5 the enemy team with him gone by obliterating top.
